 2024-05382024-05-24ESDC
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisReappointment of SYLVIE MONIQUE DENISE GUILBERT of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time Vice-Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective July 2, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of SYLVIE MONIQUE DENISE GUILBERT of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time Vice-Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective July 2, 2024.
